content:
EEE Split Lines

This script reflects back the contents of a text file after wrapping lines at a user-specified length. This feature only works with Netscape 2.0 browsers.

Select the browse button to choose a text file to upload. When you press the submit button, this script will process and reflect the contents of the file.

Enter the file to process:
Reflect as plaintext Reflect as hypertext
Enter the maximum number of characters that can appear on a line: (Default = 72)
Current as of 12 September 1996.
Courtesy of eee@uci.edu.
Please send comments to vitus@ics.uci.edu
